external_games.name: Dungeon Defenders: Talay Mining Complex Mission Pack

name: Dungeon Defenders: Talay Mining Complex Mission Pack
summary: Among the sparkling gemstones of Talay, a set of long-buried Eternia Crystals have been unearthed. But the volcanic activity of the mine is rapidly rising and its imminent eruption threatens to destroy both friend and foe. Protect the Eternia Crystals from the horde as you contend with the dangers of the mine itself!
